review.author: Architect (Claude Opus)
review.findings: Cross-model review: health-strip.js comms metrics (retry/fail/dedup rates, 5-min rolling window, comms.* wildcard subscription) + hivemind-app.js kernel comms events (emitKernelCommsEvent helper, structured send/broadcast results consumed by websocket-server ACK path). Bus wildcard supported, innerHTML XSS-safe (computed numbers only), metric arrays pruned on render + reset in destroy. Tests: health-strip 22/22, hivemind-app 15/15. Non-blocking rec: absolute cap per metric bucket (10k) for extreme throughput.

_docs.rule: If change_type !== 'routine', reviewer model MUST differ from author model
_docs.workflow: 1. Author fills author+author_model+change_type. 2. Reviewer fills reviewer+model+result+findings. 3. Pre-commit checks result=approved and cross-model rule. 4. After commit, review.json is reset to pending.
